DataElement.preferredDefinition: The words that describe the name of a person's personal belief and reverence for a supernatural power or powers regarded as creator and governor of the universe.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person's personal belief and reverence for a supernatural power or powers regarded as creator and governor of the universe.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: statistical characterization of human populations (or segments of human populations broken down by age or sex or income etc.).

Concepts.definition: The statistical characterization of human populations or segments of human populations (e.g., characterization by age, sex, race, or income).

Property.preferredDefinition: A personal or institutionalized system grounded in belief and reverence for a supernatural power or powers regarded as creator and governor of the universe. (from dictionary.com)

Concepts.definition: A personal or institutionalized system grounded in belief and reverence for a supernatural power or powers regarded as creator and governor of the universe. (from dictionary.com)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.
